content.10: I found Israel like grapes in the wilderness; I saw your fathers as the firstripe in the fig tree at her first time:
content.12: Though they bring up their children, yet will I bereave them,
content.16: Ephraim is smitten, their root is dried up, they shall bear no fruit: yea, though they bring forth, yet will I slay
content.17: My God will cast them away, because they did not hearken unto him: and they shall be wanderers among the nations.
